WorkItem.Description: Since type checking depends on (return-)type inference of other files, the set of files that are needed for type checking might be larger then the set of imported files. Since this is different from statically typed languages and very interesting for educational purposes, I wonder if you can offer a tool that computes such a list.
WorkItem.Summary: Provide a tool that lists all files involved in type checking a file

Comments.Message: Thanks for the suggestion -- assigning to Jonathan who is managing our suggestions.
